desc: You walked all day and you saw birds.
You saw a girl in the distance. She looked beautiful, but so distant. She took the bus and you never saw her again
You hit your toe against a cupboard. You remembered all the insults you knew. It might help you write lyrics soon, who knows?
You ate some toast. They tasted weird, but since you had already started, you had to finish them.
You got sick and spent the whole day in bed.
You decided to go for a walk and a person approached you to ask for your autograph
You decided to go for a walk and a person approached you to ask for your autograph
You decided to kick, like in the kung fu movies, but you tore your pants. Fuck
When you went out for a walk, a crowd rushed at you, trying to get your autograph. A girl even ripped off a piece of your shirt.
